channel.title: Need server, NPC, and smithing help
channel.description:
First off, how do I get connected to a server? Is there a server (or a version) where the NPCs are in the original places? If I get connected to a server, are there others as well? Can I fight the others?
Also, when I spawn NPCs they die with 1 hit (hit=0). Glitch? Or is there something more I need to know?
When I try to smith the smithing screen doesn't come up.
Am I missing the point of moparscape...?
Any help would be useful! :)

Where is the npc file? haven’t managed to locate it

item.title: Need server, NPC, and smithing help
item.dc:creator: @cowie367 cowie367
item.description:
@cowie367 wrote:

ok first off…

to connect to a server(non hamachi) just sart mopar wait for it to load then in server i.p put in a server i.p for example sunscape’s so it wud be abit like

username:slizer
pass:bob
server i.p:sunscape.no-ip.org

and no matter how hard u try i have not found a server to date with all npc’s in exact place on rs or anything…

if u pick a popular server there will be others on it and if u go into wildy or c wars or even duel arena(if they work) u will be able to fight them =]

the npc thing…u can spawn and its a problem becuase after u spawn u have to go into the npc file and set there hp as the have no hp when u spawn them and it results in automatic kill on connection lost…

and as for the smithing u might have to change tht and add it in because…ur server might not already have it in =][br][size=1]Posted at: September 04, 2006, 08:20:34 AM[/size][hr]lol i think a rep ++ is in order for my wrist ache lol

Read full topic
item.source: Need server, NPC, and smithing help
